pr_title: add toggle for visibility of agility course clickboxes

timeline.message: add toggle for visibility of agility course clickboxes

timeline.bodyText: I would rename these to "agility course clickboxes"
timeline.author: KasparRosin

timeline.bodyText: I would probably move this up to position 0 since it is the main purpose of the plugin
timeline.author: Adam-

timeline.bodyText: These names preferably need to fit on the panel/the fact they are agility clickboxes is implied, so maybe just Show clickboxes
timeline.author: Adam-
